weapons.name: pistol
weapons.description: You have chosen a pistol. It only has 5 bullets inside so fire wisely.

weapons.name: bat
weapons.description: You have chosen the baseball bat. It looks like it’s pretty old, maybe from the 1900s.

weapons.name: a.k 47
weapons.description: You have chosen an A.K 47. This weapon has insane accuracy and aim, great to defend you and your friend.

weapons.name: pitchfork
weapons.description: You have chosen a Pitch Fork. Quick and hurry to save your friend!”

weapons.name: plastic spoon
weapons.description: You have chosen a plastic spoon. You never know, this might come in handy. Fred is hot

weapons.name: bloody knife
weapons.description: This thing is sharp and' pointy, could probably be used as a weapon

weapons.name: sword
weapons.description: Wow! I've never held a sword before, this is definitely an upgrade from that crappy knife
